snippet: Winger Sofiane Feghouli has joined West Ham United on a free transfer from Spanish side Valencia on a three-year contract, the Premier League club announced on Tuesday....

headline.main: Winger Feghouli Signs for West Ham on a Three-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Winger Feghouli Signs for West Ham on a Three-Year Deal

lead_paragraph: Winger Sofiane Feghouli has joined West Ham United on a free transfer from Spanish side Valencia on a three-year contract, the Premier League club announced on Tuesday.

snippet: Chelsea and West Bromwich Albion have been fined for failing to ensure their players conducted themselves in an orderly fashion during their Premier League game on Jan. 13, the Football Association said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Chelsea and West Brom Fined After Fracas
headline.print_headline: Chelsea and West Brom Fined After Fracas

lead_paragraph: Chelsea and West Bromwich Albion have been fined for failing to ensure their players conducted themselves in an orderly fashion during their Premier League game on Jan. 13, the Football Association said on Tuesday.

snippet: Alvaro Negredo scored a first-half double  to set Middlesbrough on the way to a vital 3-0 Premier League win over Swansea City on Saturday and pile more pressure on Bob Bradley's struggling team....

headline.main: Negredo Double Helps Boro Ease Past Swansea
headline.print_headline: Negredo Double Helps Boro Ease Past Swansea

lead_paragraph: Alvaro Negredo scored a first-half double  to set Middlesbrough on the way to a vital 3-0 Premier League win over Swansea City on Saturday and pile more pressure on Bob Bradley's struggling team.

snippet: Zlatan Ibrahimovic was again at his irrepressible best with another double earning Jose Mourinho's increasingly confident Manchester United a 2-0 win at West Bromwich Albion in the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.main: In-Form Ibrahimovic at the Double as United Soar
headline.print_headline: In-Form Ibrahimovic at the Double as United Soar

lead_paragraph: Zlatan Ibrahimovic was again at his irrepressible best with another double earning Jose Mourinho's increasingly confident Manchester United a 2-0 win at West Bromwich Albion in the Premier League on Saturday.

snippet: Leicester City have no reason to sweat over potentially being dragged into the Premier League relegation battle, Stoke City manager Mark Hughes said while suggesting that opponents may have worked out how to play against the champions....

headline.main: Leicester Not in Danger of Relegation, Says Stoke Boss Hughes
headline.print_headline: Leicester Not in Danger of Relegation, Says Stoke Boss Hughes

lead_paragraph: Leicester City have no reason to sweat over potentially being dragged into the Premier League relegation battle, Stoke City manager Mark Hughes said while suggesting that opponents may have worked out how to play against the champions.

snippet: Revenue from shirt sponsorship in Europe's top leagues has risen 13 percent to 830 million euros (655.9 million pounds) this season, powered by a 35 percent increase in England's Premier League, according to a new report....

headline.main: Shirt Sponsor Revenue Up 13 Percent in Top Euro Leagues
headline.print_headline: Shirt Sponsor Revenue Up 13 Percent in Top Euro Leagues

lead_paragraph: Revenue from shirt sponsorship in Europe's top leagues has risen 13 percent to 830 million euros (655.9 million pounds) this season, powered by a 35 percent increase in England's Premier League, according to a new report.

snippet: New Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has no intention of ditching the methods that brought him success in Spain and Germany and wants to prove it is possible to win in the Premier League by playing attractive football....

headline.main: New City Boss Guardiola Aims to Prove Himself in England
headline.print_headline: New City Boss Guardiola Aims to Prove Himself in England

lead_paragraph: New Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has no intention of ditching the methods that brought him success in Spain and Germany and wants to prove it is possible to win in the Premier League by playing attractive football.

snippet: Swansea City manager Bob Bradley wants his struggling side to stay united and stop digging holes for themselves after Saturday's 3-0 loss at Middlesbrough left the Welsh side second from bottom in the Premier League....

headline.main: Bradley Demands Unity in Swansea Fight Against the Drop
headline.print_headline: Bradley Demands Unity in Swansea Fight Against the Drop

lead_paragraph: Swansea City manager Bob Bradley wants his struggling side to stay united and stop digging holes for themselves after Saturday's 3-0 loss at Middlesbrough left the Welsh side second from bottom in the Premier League.

headline.main: Last-Gasp Slimani Spot On for Leicester
headline.print_headline: Last-Gasp Slimani Spot On for Leicester

snippet: England midfielder Ross Barkley headed a late leveller to salvage a 2-2 draw for Everton at Hull City in the Premier League on Friday....

headline.main: Late Barkley Goal Earns Everton a Point at Hull
headline.print_headline: Late Barkley Goal Earns Everton a Point at Hull

lead_paragraph: England midfielder Ross Barkley headed a late leveller to salvage a 2-2 draw for Everton at Hull City in the Premier League on Friday.
